description: The underlying cause identified in the post relates to the challenges posed by the shift towards modern Teams and its integration with Citrix AVD and FSLogix. This misalignment creates concerns about readiness for optimal functionality when employing Teams updates, especially in environments heavily reliant on virtualization technology. As Teams updates are quite substantial, they can exacerbate WAN traffic if not managed correctly. The mention of FSLogix suggests that issues with profile management could lead to complications during this transition. Therefore, it’s crucial for system administrators to monitor these integrations closely and ensure that all components are fully operational to minimize impact on end-user experience. For further details, administrators can refer to the overview and release notes provided by Microsoft.
